amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for the East Coast Shellfish Research Institute at the East Coast Shellfish Growers Association, Toms River, New Jersey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds to be used for the East Coast Shellfish Research Institute at the East Coast Shellfish Growers Association, Toms River, New Jersey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 337 (Roll no. 736).
